questions: Did he prepare properly before going to the shop?
Did he plan in advance which SKUs he would try to sell today?
Did he write down the shop names and plan the route?

Greeting & Relationship: Did he greet the shopkeeper warmly and interact in a polite manner? Did he ask/confirm the shopkeeper’s name? If he didn’t know the name, did he make an effort to find it out?
In the case of an existing outlet in the SR’s route – what is his relationship like with this shopkeeper?
In the case of a new outlet in the SR’s route – did he make an effort to build a relationship with this shopkeeper?
Stock and Merchandising: Did he check the stock properly and keep the products arranged neatly so they are easy to find?
Discovery: Before starting to push products, did he ask questions to understand the shop’s needs?
Time Management: From the start to the end of the shop call, did he manage the time properly?
Problem Solving: If the shopkeeper raised any issues, did he listen attentively with patience and try to solve them?
Objection Handling: If the shopkeeper raised any objections while placing the order, did he make an effort to resolve them and encourage the shopkeeper to place the order?
Order Verification: Did he properly repeat/confirm the order with the shopkeeper and ensure that everything was noted accurately?
If the order was not taken – what attempts did he make to convince the shopkeeper? Did the shopkeeper become more confident about placing an order next time?
auditor_system_prompt: You are a professional Sales Auditor. You will be given: (1) a conversational transcript of a sales call, and (2) a set of predefined questionnaire questions. Your job is to fill the questionnaire in light of the provided transcript, strictly following the given format and scoring rules. Use only the questionnaire that best matches the subject matter of the transcript. Include all 13 main questions in the same order and document any extra questions that were asked but are not in the questionnaire. Output must be valid JSON loadable directly in Python without any modifications.
